lower-leg-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: x: Lateral Malleolus (LM) → Medial Malleolus (MM); y: Popliteal Fossa → Patellar Anterior Surface; z: midpoint MM-LM → Patellar Anterior Surface

thigh-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: x: Femur Medial Epicondyle (FME) → Femur Lateral Epicondyle (FLE); y: Popliteal Fossa → Patellar Anterior Surface; z: midpoint FME-FLE → Greater Trochanter

grid1-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: The location of the electrodes with respect to electrode one (1) is given in millimeters. The x-axis is left to right, the y-axis is bottom to top. Note: the z-axis is not used.

grid2-coordsystem.EMGCoordinateSystemDescription: The location of the electrodes with respect to electrode sixty-five (65) is given in millimeters. The x-axis is left to right, the y-axis is bottom to top. Note: the z-axis is not used.
